DOC.brief_summary: - Objective : To analyze effect neuromuscular electrostimulation maturation radiocephalic arteriovenous fistula ( RC-AVF ) patient chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) stage 5-5D - Design : Clinical Trial medical device , 18-month , single-center , within hospital setting . - Disease disorder study : vascular Access maturation . - Population : Patients CKD stage 5-5D research center . - Project duration : 78 week - Methodology : - Patients CKD stage 5-5D undergone native AV service station give inform consent meeting inclusion criterion include . - At baseline two study group establish : - Group 1 : neuromuscular electrostimulation - Group 2 : isometric exercise
DOC.detailed_description: - Objective : To analyze effect neuromuscular electrostimulation maturation radiocephalic arteriovenous fistula ( RC-AVF ) patient chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) stage 5-5D - Design : Clinical Trial medical device , 18-month , single-center , within hospital setting . - Disease disorder study : vascular Access maturation . - Population : Patients CKD stage 5-5D research center . - Project duration : 78 week - Methodology : - Patients CKD stage 5-5D undergone native AV service station give inform consent meeting inclusion criterion include . - At baseline two study group establish : - Group 1 : neuromuscular electrostimulation - Group 2 : isometric exercise - At baseline , patient include study main demographic variable collect , anthropometric , biochemical parameter , hemodynamic data , Eco Doppler AV ( ECO mapping ) prescribe medical treatment . - Likewise , make assessment muscle strength skinfold upper limb static dynamometry make native AV . - During study period follow phase establish : • Phase 1 ( 4 week ) : - The control group receive usual care outpatient AV . - Patients assign group , perform program AV electrostimulation affect upper extremity ( accord program ) 7 day completion native AV . - At end phase group conduct ECO doppler ( ECO4s ) AV regulate Vascular Surgery . • Phase 2 ( 8 week ) : - The control group receive usual care outpatient AV . - Patients assign group , perform program AV electrostimulation affect upper extremity ( accord program ) - At end phase , group conduct ECO doppler ( ECO8s ) regulate AV Vascular Surgery - During phase study , patient hemodialysis follow analytical control program Nephrology receive medical treatment accord standard clinical practice . - At end phase study , patient perform assessment muscle strength centimetría , skinfold thickness static dynamometry member AV make . - Calendar : A provisional timetable present - Presentation CEIC study : September 2014 - inclusion Period : 78 week - Follow-up period : 2 month - Close database : 1 month - Statistical analysis : 1 month - Source funding : Not available
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients age less 18 year old Patients track CCEE Nephrology 3 month Patients AV native AV upper limb without prior Patients give write informed consent Exclusion criterion : prior cardiovascular event ( acute myocardial infarction , unstable angina , stroke ... . ) last 3 month .
